title: Digital Material Passport Schema
description: A comprehensive schema for Digital Material Passports that encapsulates information about metals

NumericResult.title: NumericResult
NumericResult.description: A numeric value with optional comparison operator

Operator.description: Comparison operator indicating how the value should be interpreted

SignificantDigits.description: Number of significant digits to maintain

Description.description: Textual description of the boolean result

AllowedValues.description: List of allowed values (for enumerated results)

RangeResult.title: RangeResult
RangeResult.description: A result expressed as a range from minimum to maximum

Minimum.description: The lower bound of the range

Maximum.description: The upper bound of the range

Inclusive.description: Whether the bounds are inclusive (true) or exclusive (false)

ArrayResult.title: ArrayResult
ArrayResult.description: Result type for tests with parameter-dependent specifications

Parameter.description: Parameter value for this data point

Value.description: Measured numeric value at this parameter

Minimum.description: Minimum specification for THIS specific parameter

Maximum.description: Maximum specification for THIS specific parameter

Target.description: Target value for THIS specific parameter

Status.description: Pass/Fail status for this specific point

MultiValueResult.title: MultiValueResult
MultiValueResult.description: Result type for inspections that produce multiple individual test values with associated statistical calculations

Values.description: Array of individual numeric test values

Statistics.description: Statistical calculations for the test values

StandardDeviationType.description: Type of standard deviation calculation used

Method.description: Statistical method or approach used for calculations

Result.title: Result
Result.description: Union type of all possible result types

Measurement.title: Measurement
Measurement.description: A measurement with property metadata, actual result, and specification limits

PropertyId.description: The identifier of the property according to a standard catalog (if applicable)

PropertyName.description: The descriptive name of the property being measured (human-readable)

PropertySymbol.description: The standardized technical symbol for the property

Method.description: The testing method or standard used

TestConditions.description: Test conditions as text (e.g., temperature, environment) - use SpecimenSpecification for structured specimen location/orientation

SpecimenSpecification.description: Specimen location and orientation for mechanical testing per industry standards

Actual.description: The actual measured or calculated result

PropertiesStandard.description: Reference to the standard catalog for property definitions

Interpretation.description: Interpretation of the result (e.g., 'In Specification', 'Out of Specification')

Formula.description: For calculated values, this field provides the formula definition

ChemicalElement.title: ChemicalElement
ChemicalElement.description: The chemical composition of an element or formula in the product

PropertyId.description: The identifier of the property according to a standard catalog (if applicable)

PropertyName.description: The descriptive name of the property being measured (human-readable)

PropertySymbol.description: The standardized technical symbol for the property

Method.description: The testing method or standard used

TestConditions.description: Test conditions as text (e.g., temperature, environment)

Actual.description: The actual measured or calculated result

PropertiesStandard.description: Reference to the standard catalog for property definitions

Interpretation.description: Interpretation of the result (e.g., 'In Specification', 'Out of Specification')

Formula.description: For calculated values, this field provides the formula definition

SampleRef.description: Reference to the specific sample used for this element analysis (when multiple samples are used)

MeltingProcess.title: MeltingProcess
MeltingProcess.description: The metallurgical process used for melting and refining

ChemicalAnalysis.title: ChemicalAnalysis
ChemicalAnalysis.description: Complete chemical analysis of the material

HeatNumber.description: The heat or melt number defining the chemical properties

CastingDate.description: The date when the heat was cast

CastingMethod.description: The method used to cast the material, determining its initial solid form

SampleLocation.description: The location where the chemical analysis sample was taken

SampleType.description: The type of sample used for chemical analysis

Elements.description: The list of elements and their measured values

AnalysisStandard.description: The standard according to which the chemical analysis was performed

Person.title: Person
Person.description: Representation of an individual contact person.

Name.description: The full name of the contact person

Role.description: The role of the person in the business process, e.g. 'Quality Manager' or 'Acceptance Officer'

Department.description: The department the person is associated with, e.g. 'Factory Production Control'

Email.description: The email address of the contact person

Phone.description: The phone number of the contact person

CageCode.description: The Commercial and Government Entity Code (CAGE), a unique identifier assigned to suppliers to government or defense agencies

Party.title: Party
Party.description: An organization or entity involved in the inspection certificate process.

Name.description: The legal name of the organization.

District.description: The district, borough, or sub-city administrative division. Required for addresses in Japan (ku/shi), China (district), South Korea (gu), and urban areas of India.

StateProvince.description: The state, province, region, or primary administrative division. Format varies by country: 2-letter codes for US/CA, full names for others.

Country.description: The two-letter ISO country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

Email.description: The organization's primary email address for communications related to inspection certificates.

Logo.description: The organization's logo as a base64-encoded PNG image.

Contacts.description: Contact persons associated with the organization.

Parties.title: Parties
Parties.description: The parties and their roles in the business transaction.

Manufacturer.description: The party manufacturing the goods and issuing the certificate.

Customer.description: The party purchasing the goods from the manufacturer.

Subcustomer.description: A secondary customer or end client for whom the Customer is purchasing the goods.

GoodsReceiver.description: The party receiving the physical goods, which may differ from the Customer (e.g., a warehouse, subsidiary, or freight forwarder).

CertificateReceiver.description: The party receiving the inspection certificate, which may differ from the Customer or GoodsReceiver.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Information about the order submitted by the customer to the manufacturer.

Position.description: The order position number or line item.

Date.description: The date of issuing the order.

QuantityUnit.description: The unit of the order quantity.

CustomerProductId.description: The internal product identifier of the Customer.

CustomerProductName.description: The internal product name used by the Customer.

GoodsReceiptId.description: The identifier for the goods receipt issued by the Customer or GoodsReceiver.

Delivery.title: Delivery
Delivery.description: Information from the delivery note associated with the shipment.

Id.description: The identifier of the delivery note.

Position.description: The position on the delivery note.

Date.description: The date of issuing the delivery note.

QuantityUnit.description: The unit of the shipped quantity.

InternalOrderId.description: The internal order number issued at the manufacturer.

InternalOrderPosition.description: The position on the internal order issued at the manufacturer.

Transport.description: A reference to the transport, e.g., license plates of trucks or container numbers.

BusinessTransaction.title: BusinessTransaction
BusinessTransaction.description: All information about the underlying commercial transaction including order and delivery.

TransactionData.title: TransactionData
TransactionData.description: The complete transaction information including parties and business data.

ProductNorm.title: ProductNorm
ProductNorm.description: Standard defining product properties and requirements

Designation.description: The designation of the product norm

Year.description: The year of publication of the norm

Grade.description: The material grade according to the norm

MaterialNorm.title: MaterialNorm
MaterialNorm.description: Standard defining material properties and composition

Designation.description: The designation of the material norm

Year.description: The year of publication of the norm

Grade.description: The material grade according to the norm

MaterialDesignation.title: MaterialDesignation
MaterialDesignation.description: Standard designation for material or alloy composition

Designation.description: The material designation according to the system

MassNorm.title: MassNorm
MassNorm.description: Standard defining mass, weight, or dimensional requirements

Designation.description: The designation of the mass norm

Year.description: The year of publication of the norm

Category.description: The category or class according to the norm

ProductShape.title: ProductShape
ProductShape.description: Physical shape and dimensions of the product

Form.description: The basic form of the product

Thickness.description: The thickness of the product (for flat products)

Diameter.description: The diameter of the product (for round products)

OuterDiameter.description: The outer diameter of the product (for tubular products)

InnerDiameter.description: The inner diameter of the product (for tubular products)

WallThickness.description: The wall thickness of the product (for tubular products)

Height.description: The height of the product (for structural shapes)

FlangeWidth.description: The flange width of the product (for structural shapes)

FlangeThickness.description: The flange thickness of the product (for structural shapes)

WebThickness.description: The web thickness of the product (for structural shapes)

Area.description: The cross-sectional area of the product

Unit.description: The unit of measurement for dimensions

OtherDimensions.description: Additional dimensions not covered by standard fields

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Complete description of the product being certified

ProductNorms.description: List of product norms applicable to the product

MaterialNorms.description: List of material norms applicable to the product

MaterialDesignations.description: List of material or alloy designations for the product

MassNorms.description: List of mass or dimensional norms applicable to the product

Shape.description: Physical shape and dimensions of the product

BatchId.description: Identification of the batch, charge, or lot

SurfaceCondition.description: Surface condition or finish of the product

CountryOfOrigin.description: Country where the product was manufactured

ManufacturingLocation.description: Specific location where the product was manufactured

ProductionDate.description: Date when the product was produced

Marking.description: Description of physical markings on the product

SupplementaryStandards.description: Additional standards to which the product conforms

CustomsClassification.description: Customs tariff classification for international trade compliance

StandardDescription.description: Official HS description of the product

RegionalCodes.description: Regional tariff codes for specific jurisdictions

SpecificationReference.description: Reference to the steel product specification defining this material

Name.description: Name of the steel product specification as given by creator or standard

Revision.description: Revision, version, or issue number of the specification

Creator.description: Organization that created the specification (if custom)

BaseStandard.description: Steel product standard this specification is derived from (if applicable)

DeliveryConditions.description: Physical delivery conditions and specifications for the product

DeliveryConditions.title: DeliveryConditions
DeliveryConditions.description: Physical delivery conditions and specifications for metal products

Coloring.description: Color specifications applied to the product for identification or protection

Method.description: Method used for coloring the product

Color.description: Specific color applied to the product

Coverage.description: Extent of color coverage on the product

Marking.description: Physical markings applied to the product for identification and traceability

Type.description: Method used for marking the product

Content.description: Text or symbols included in the marking

Location.description: Physical location of the marking on the product

Legibility.description: Assessment of marking visibility and readability

Bundles.description: Bundling and packaging specifications for the delivered product

Type.description: Type of bundling or packaging used

WeightUnit.description: Unit of weight measurement for the bundle

Unit.description: Unit of measurement for bundle dimensions

Material.description: Material used for bundling (straps, wrapping, etc.)

Condition.description: Condition of the bundling material and packaging

Stamping.description: Detailed stamping specifications for traceability and identification

Location.description: Specific location where stamping was applied

Content.description: Information included in the stamped marking

Legibility.description: Clarity and readability of the stamped marking

Equipment.description: Type of equipment used for stamping

IndividualStatement.title: IndividualStatement
IndividualStatement.description: An individual statement requiring explicit confirmation

RegulatoryReference.description: Optional reference to regulation or legal requirement

ValidationStatement.title: ValidationStatement
ValidationStatement.description: Statement of compliance or declaration of conformity

Statement.description: The full text of the declaration of conformity or compliance statement

Standards.description: List of standards to which conformity is declared

ComplianceType.description: The type of compliance being declared

ValidatingPerson.title: ValidatingPerson
ValidatingPerson.description: Person responsible for validation and approval

Name.description: Name of the person validating the certificate

Title.description: Job title or position of the validator

StampImage.description: Base64 encoded image of the signature or stamp

CEMarking.title: CEMarking
CEMarking.description: CE marking information for products sold in the European Economic Area

CEImage.description: Base64 encoded image of the CE marking

NotifiedBodyNumber.description: The identification number of the Notified Body

DoCYear.description: The year when the Declaration of Conformity was issued

DoCNumber.description: The Declaration of Conformity document number

Directives.description: EU directives to which the product conforms

MarkingImage.description: Base64 encoded image of the marking

IssuingBody.description: Authority or organization that issued the certification

IssueDate.description: Date when the certificate or approval was issued

ExpiryDate.description: Expiry date of the certification or approval, if applicable

Validation.title: Validation
Validation.description: Validation information and declarations of conformity for the certificate

Validators.description: Persons who validated or approved the certificate

ValidationPlace.description: Location where the validation was performed

CertificateType.description: The type of certificate according to relevant standards

Standard.description: The standard defining the certificate type

Type.description: The specific certificate type according to the standard

HeatTreatmentStage.title: HeatTreatmentStage
HeatTreatmentStage.description: A single stage in a heat treatment process

HeatingRate.description: Rate of heating (degrees per time unit)

CoolingRate.description: Rate of cooling (degrees per time unit)

ProcessBundling.title: ProcessBundling
ProcessBundling.description: How items are arranged and bundled during heat treatment

ItemsPerCharge.description: Number of items in the furnace charge

SeparatorType.description: Type of separators used between items

QualityCheck.title: QualityCheck
QualityCheck.description: In-process quality check during heat treatment

Method.description: Method or standard used for the check

SpecimenSpecification.title: SpecimenSpecification
SpecimenSpecification.description: Specimen location and orientation for mechanical testing

Location.description: Standardized location through the material thickness or cross-section

CustomLocation.description: Custom location description when Location is 'Custom'

Orientation.description: Specimen orientation relative to material processing direction

HeatTreatmentDetails.title: HeatTreatmentDetails
HeatTreatmentDetails.description: Comprehensive heat treatment process information including temperature profiles, duration, cooling methods, and process identification

Stages.description: Array of process stages in the heat treatment

ProcessBundling.description: Details about how items were arranged during processing

ProcessDate.description: Date when heat treatment was performed

EquipmentCertification.description: Calibration or certification reference for equipment

Operator.description: Person or team responsible for the process

DigitalMaterialPassport.title: DigitalMaterialPassport
DigitalMaterialPassport.description: A digital representation that encapsulates comprehensive information about a material used in a product, specific to each production batch.

Languages.description: List of languages used in the passport

Id.description: Unique identifier for this material passport

Version.description: Version of the Digital Material Passport schema

IssueDate.description: Date when this passport was issued

ExpirationDate.description: Optional date when this passport expires

TransactionData.description: Information about the business transaction and parties involved

Product.description: Information about the product being certified

SupplementaryTests.description: Collection of supplementary tests and inspections

Validation.description: Information about the certification validation status
